description: IntroductionThe Uspeed USB 3.0 SDXC car reader adopts the innovative pop-up design, and it can protect your SDXC card properly by complete insertion. By adopting the premium chip and raw material, you may enjoy super-fast and safe data transfer with the card reader.Card compatibilitySDXC, SDHC, SD, MMC, MMC4.0System requirementsWindows 2000 / ME/ XP / Vista / 7 (32bit / 64bit ), MAC OS XAbout UspeedWith a focus on computer peripherals, Uspeed is committed to providing products with sensible design and superior quality. By adopting the latest technology standards, we provide ideal solutions for fast data transmission, lower power consumption and broad compatibility.PLEASE NOTEUsers using older versions of Windows XP or Mac OS X may need to install operating system upgrades / patches to support the exFAT file system of many high capacity cards of 64GB or higher.
title: Uspeed USB 3.0 SDXC Card Reader for SDXC, SDHC, SD, MMC, MMC 4.0 Card - 65 Mbps, Support UHS-I
